DOC.brief_summary: Erectile problem may lead anxiety , loss self-esteem depression and/or stress . The purpose national study determine vardenafil effective treat impotent men ( erectile dysfunction ) evaluate influence self-esteem self-confidence . During visit patient ask question erection , fill different questionnaire sexuality , mood , feeling , self-esteem sexual activity .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Efficacy Vardenafil , Influence Self-esteem Self-confidence Subjects With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 year old Males erectile dysfunction Stable heterosexual relationship Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate use Other exclusion criterion apply acc . Summary Product Characteristics
